data.description: Be rewarded for your everyday purchases and access a flexible Rewards program with complimentary insurances (conditions and exclusions apply) and Personal Concierge

fees.name: Account Service

discounts.description: Exclusive offer for existing ANZ customers. $0 annual service fee in the first year for new cards.
discounts.additionalInfo: Exclusive offer for existing ANZ customers. New card. T&Cs, eligibility criteria, fees and charges apply.

fees.additionalInfo: Annual service fee for the credit card account

fees.name: Annual Rewards Program

discounts.description: Exclusive offer for existing ANZ customers. $0 annual rewards program fee in the first year for new cards only.
discounts.additionalInfo: Exclusive offer for existing ANZ customers. New card. T&Cs, eligibility criteria, fees and charges apply.

fees.additionalInfo: Annual service fee for membership of the Rewards program

fees.name: Additional Card Holder
fees.additionalInfo: Annual service fee for each additional cardholder

fees.name: Additional Cardholder Rewards Program
fees.additionalInfo: Annual service fee for each additional cardholder's membership of the Rewards program

We generally charge 3% of any cash advance from your credit card account, subject to a minimum of $4 if the cash advance is made outside Australia. The amount on which the fee is charged may include fees and other charges related to the cash advance transaction. For ANZ Rewards Travel Adventures cards, we won’t charge a Cash Advance Fee on cash withdrawals made outside Australia. See your letter of offer for details (including how we calculate the fee and when it applies).
fees.name: Cash Advance

discounts.description: No Late Payment Fee will apply if you hold an ANZ Access Basic Account.
discounts.additionalInfo: This applies to all onsale consumer cards products.

discounts.description: You will not be charged an Overlimit Fee where ANZ provides you with an Informal Overlimit amount during the Statement Period and: - you hold an ANZ Access Basic Account; or - we determine that: (1) Your account was opened before 18 June 2012 and you have asked us to decline transactions (in most cases) that will take you over the credit limit; or (2) Your account was opened on or after 18 June 2012 and at the time the Informal Overlimit amount is provided you have not consented, or you have withdrawn your consent to being charged an Overlimit Fee (unless you are charged an Overlimit Fee in accordance with paragraph A in respect of an earlier Informal Overlimit amount).

fees.additionalInfo: Instalment Plan fees are determined when a customer accepts an instalment plan.
fees.name: Instalment Plan Fee

fees.additionalInfo: A Balance Transfer Fee may be charged when a customer does a balance transfer.
fees.name: Balance Transfer Fee

fees.additionalInfo: We charge a Priority Fee if you ask us to issue and deliver a card and/or PIN mailer as a priority.
fees.name: Priority Fee

data.name: ANZ Rewards Platinum

features.additionalInfo: Up to 9 additional cardholders for an annual fee of $65 per additional cardholder.

features.additionalValue: Rental Vehicle Excess in Australia Insurance

features.additionalInfo: Up to 55 days interest free days on purchases
Access using ANZ Internet Banking or ANZ App
1.5 Reward Points per $1 spent on eligible purchases up to and including $2,000 per statement period. 0.5 Reward Point per $1 spent on eligible purchases above $2,000 per statement period.
The product includes fraud protection features.
ANZ has teamed up with Australia’s leading cashback program Cashrewards. Join Cashrewards for free to access cashback offers from more than 2,000 popular retailers and get more for your money!

80,000 extra ANZ Rewards Points and $50 back to your to your new ANZ Rewards Platinum credit card when you spend $2,000 on eligible purchases in the first 3 months from approval. New Rewards card. T&Cs, eligibility criteria, fees and charges apply.

80,000 extra ANZ Rewards Points and $50 back to your to your new ANZ Rewards Platinum credit card when you spend $2,000 on eligible purchases in the first 3 months from approval. New Rewards card. T&Cs, eligibility criteria, fees and charges apply.

Earn 80,000 extra ANZ Reward Points when you spend $2,000 on eligible purchases in the first 3 months from approval, plus $0 annual fee in the first year. T&Cs, eligibility
criteria, fees and charges apply (including an annual fee, $0 for the first year, currently $95* thereafter). *From 8 November 2023, the annual fee will be increased to $149.

The offer is available to new ANZ home loan applicants who apply for a new ANZ credit card and new ANZ Home Loan in the one application and are approved for that new ANZ credit card.

eligibility.additionalInfo: You must be 18 years of age or older to apply

eligibility.additionalValue: Australian Citizen, Australian Permanent Resident, New Zealand Citizen or have more than 9 months left on a valid working visa, student visa, business visa or investor visa

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Rates are subject to change. The interest rate that applies to cash advances is currently equivalent to the interest rate that applies to standard balance transfers.
0% on Promotional Balance Transfers for 18 months. Existing Customers Only. Conditions Apply.
